comment: The =git clone= location of the propositum repo

local: $promptPropositumDrv = if(($result = Read-Host -Prompt "Please provide a letter for the Propositum root drive (default is 'P').") -eq ""){("P").Trim(":")+":"}else{$result.Trim(":")+":"}
local-gs: $promptPropositumDrv = if(($result = Read-Host -Prompt "Please provide a letter for the Propositum root drive (default is 'P').") -eq ""){("P").Trim(":")+":"}else{$result.Trim(":")+":"}
testing: $promptPropositumDrv = if(($result = Read-Host -Prompt "Please provide a letter for the Propositum root drive (default is 'P').") -eq ""){("P").Trim(":")+":"}else{$result.Trim(":")+":"}
comment: The drive letter =$propositumLocation= will map to
API Token for interaction with GH (not currently used in non-AppVeyor builds)

local: $promptSupersetPassword = Read-Host -AsSecureString -Prompt "Please provide a password for the Superset user 'Propositum'."
local-gs: $promptSupersetPassword = Read-Host -AsSecureString -Prompt "Please provide a password for the Superset user 'Propositum'."
testing: $promptSupersetPassword = Read-Host -AsSecureString -Prompt "Please provide a password for the Superset user 'Propositum'."
comment: The password for the =propositum= user for the =superset= application
